name: risk-monitor
prompt: Quick risk check. Run `botcore get_paper_portfolio` to check daily PnL and `botcore get_paper_trading_status` to verify engine is running. ONLY alert if: daily loss exceeds 3% of portfolio, paper trading stopped unexpectedly, or any critical issue detected. If everything is normal, respond with exactly RISK_OK and nothing else - do NOT send any notification. If alerting, send URGENT notification to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the alert message. Be urgent and specific.
